channel.title: Death Glitch what would this coding do?
channel.description:
} else if (deadtimer == 0) { ApplyDead(); loadmusic(203); IsDead = false; deadanim = false; frame1(); Refresh(); ResetAttack(); ResetAttackNPC(); deadtimer = 4; } if(playerLevel[3] == 0) { writestats(); playerLevel[3] += getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])/2; NewHP += getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])/2;
Would this coding sort out the death glitch when i respawn i die at have 0 hp when i go back to respawn point.
